divs: Sighting DetailsLast night I saw a very unusally small treetop level object flying and hovering then changing directions unlike a plane or any known craft then 2 other equally strange lights similar to each of the 3 appeared.I had seen a small aircraft before I saw the sighting.The night before on Memorial day evening at 11:00 pm I saw a light come out of nowhere and go from a dead stop to a real fast takeoff in the direction of the highway followed by another light moving slowly but giving chase.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: second strange light or ufo in 2 nights in a row
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Athens
There were no other sightings in Athens on or around May 28th 2013
